name: The Florez Group
tagline: We are a full-service web-development team
description: We are a full-service web-development team you can call on to design interactive digital experiences. Need to give your online storefront a makeover? Inject fresh energy into your current site? Initiate a brand new outreach campaign? Add programming muscles during a deadline crunch? We have the talent, know-how, and drive to commandeer a complex multi-front mission from start to finish, carry you through a critical phase, or just help you put out fires.
